version_description: We never stop improving our app to provide the best mobile poker experience to our millions of players across the world. If you like our work please take a moment to rate our app and let us know!
We never stop improving our app to provide the best mobile poker experience to our millions of players across the world. If you like our work please take a moment to rate our app and let us know!

You spoke, we listened, and we're delighted to unveil the next generation PokerStars app that we're sure will give you an even better gaming experience.
Gaming tailored to you
Our new and improved interface puts your favourite tables, games and features first – so you can start playing in just a few taps.

It's now even easier to find your favourites with your 'Recently Played' tab; explore the 'Suggested' tab for something new; or use the 'Find a Game' feature if you're searching for something specific.

More tables, more poker

Our new graphics engine makes it even easier for you to play multiple tables seamlessly, with better graphics, animations and more. You can even play our casino games side-by-side or bet on sports directly from a table, so you never miss a beat.

Stars Rewards

Need to see how far you are from completing a progress bar? Any unopened Stars Rewards Chests? How many bonuses, tickets or StarsCoin you have? Just tap 'My Stars' and find everything you need about your Challenges and rewards.

Stay in Control

Set your table limits, deposit limits, session reminders and more, directly from the app. Responsible gaming is very important to us, and we want to make sure you're staying safe, as well as having fun.

We never stop improving our app to provide the best mobile poker experience to our millions of players across the world. If you like our work, please take a moment to rate our app and let us know!

As part of this latest update you'll find:
* All-in Cash Out - Players now have the option to reduce their risk in all-in situations and take a cash out amount based on the value of their hand.
* Search Tournaments - Looking for a specific tournament? Tap the spy glass and use the new text based tournament search.
* Bug fixes and polishing based of your player feedback and internal testing

We never stop improving our app to provide the best mobile poker experience to our millions of players across the world. If you like our work, please take a moment to rate our app and let us know!

As part of this latest update you'll find:
* All-in Cash Out - Players now have the option to reduce their risk in all-in situations and take a cash out amount based on the value of their hand.
* Search Tournaments - Looking for a specific tournament? Tap the spy glass and use the new text based tournament search.
* Bug fixes and polishing based of your player feedback and internal testing

* Swap Hold'em is a great twist on the world’s favourite poker game, Texas Hold’em. On their turn to act, at any point in the hand, any player may swap one or both of their hole cards for new ones, for free, once per hand.
* New simplified lobby for ease of access to games
* Tournament filters – filter upcoming tournaments according to your preference.
* Twitch users can take advantage of a new feature that allows them to connect their Stars Account to their Twitch account
* Bug Fixes and performance improvements
